body.name: WJPILIS Smart Watch for Men Women Kids Android iOS Phone Compatible, Bluetooth Touch Screen Fitness Tracker Smartwatch with Call/SMS/Sleep Monitor/Pedometer & Nylon Bands（Black）
features: 【New Upgraded & Trendy Smart Watch】The ultra thin metal frame smartwatch equipped with 2.09 inch high sensitivity touch screen,Stylish UI style, diversified clock interface.200+dial design for you in smart watch app, you can set your favorite photos or pictures as watch faces.Hand gestures to wake up the screen, longer battery life and so on. WJPILIS Smart Watch, the best partner of your personality life!

【Smart Notifications for Call and Messages】With built-in speaker and bluetooth connectivity, you can answer and reject calls, check your call history via the smartwatch.Also it supports multiple smart reminders（Call & SMS from Facebook,Twitter,Whatsapp,LinkedIn, etc）, never miss any important information during meetings or workout and enjoy the convenience from your wrist.

【All-Day Heart Rate Monitor and Sleep Tracker】Fitness watch adopting advanced sensors, provide 24-hour continuity real-time Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen (Sp02), and Sleep Monitoring(Deep/light sleep，provides comprehensive sleep quality analysis). You can view a week's worth of health reports in app to better grasp changes for your health( Please scan the QR code in the manual to download the app). NOTE the data cannot be used as a medical-grade test.

【Multifunctional Smart Watch and Broad Compatibility】This fitness activity tracker has 5 sports modes to record your daily walking steps, distances, calories. And the features of Stopwatch, weather,music camera control,alarm clock,find mobile phone, Muti-language, brightness adjustment makes this smart watch practical and comprehensive. It compatible with iOS 9.0 & Android 5.0 and above.

【More Details & Perfect Gift】Included magnetic charging cable ensures an easy charging method. The smart watch comes with a nylon band and silicone band,soft and lightweight, can be changed according to your mood.Smart Watch with Call for Men Women Kids & Perfect Gift.Smart watch for smart life, being a very good gift for friends and family members.If you have any product problems can free to contact us.
body.description: Notice: 1. The smart watch is Bluetooth 4.0. All functions support most iOS 9.0 & Android 5.0 above smartphones. 2. For iOS phone, it supports answer & call, phone book, music play, camera, clock, pedometer, sleep monitoring, sedentary reminder, etc. 3. It is waterproof normal daily activities like hand washing. Cannot swim/shower.

productInformation.name: Compatible Devices
productInformation.value: Android OS 5.0 / iOS 9.0 or above and Bluetooth 5.0 or above smartphones

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FITNESS ACTIVITY TRACKER WATCH WJPILIS Bluetooth Smart Watch Lead a Better Healthier Happier Life.This smartwatch is suitable for people of all ages, for Men Women and Kids. It is a very good gift for your kids friends families.

Never miss a moment. Sync with your phone to make or answer the call, right on your wrist. Never miss a call - answer and make calls directly on your watch when your phone is out of reach.You can also choose to switch off the call feature. Everything You Need on Your Wrist. The perfect companion to keep you organized and productive all day long. Receive one-way notifications for emails, SMS messages, and incoming phone calls, as well as alerts for Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, LinkedIn, Snap, Slack, weather forecasts, and other mobile apps. Large Color Touchscreen 2.09" TFT LCD touch screen, wear it your way with custom fitness watch faces. The itouch smart watch screen lights up instantly when you lift your wrist, staying visible and clear even in the sun.

All-in-one Fitness Tracker. Track your everyday accomplishments: steps, distance and calories burned. You can download and install the app 'FunRun' to record and store your activities. (The app just support Android phones) Sleep Monitoring and Sedentary Reminder. It records how long you spend asleep and break that down into periods of deep and light sleep or when you're awake, allowing you to gauge your sleep quality. This watch will also remind you to take a rest to avoid over-fatigue. Set You Step Goals Set the step target in our app, and it will vibrate to remind when you reached.

Music From Your Wrist/Remote Camera Control. Tap screen to switch next song, music play, pause and control the phone shutter to take pictures from your wrist. Bring you pleasure time anywhere. Control your music with your phone's selected music player whether it's Spotify, Pandora, Soundcloud, Google Play, iTunes or Apple Music. Stylish Sports Design This smart watch is a titanic combination of practicality, strength, and comfort. Come with a nylon band and silicone band, Light enough to wear anywhere comfortably,breathable and sturdy design is perfect for use during sports. Wireless Charging Place the Smart Watch on a wireless charger to instantly start charging. Lets you eliminate the need to constantly plug and unplug cables.

Notice: 1. The smart watch is Bluetooth 4.0. All functions support most iOS 9.0 & Android 5.0 above smartphones. 2. For iOS phone, it supports answer & call, phone book, music play, camera, clock, pedometer, sleep monitoring, sedentary reminder, etc. 3. It is waterproof normal daily activities like hand washing. Cannot swim/shower. Package Contents: 1 x Smart Watch 1 X USB Wireless Charging 2 x Bands 1 x User Manual
